name: 方旭偉
objective:
邀請校內外學者專家至校針對某一專長領域進行專題演講，讓學生藉由聽講及心得報告之寫作，開展視野，並與時代之脈動相契合。(在職專班)
Invited speakers from different disciplines give speech in their specialized area. Thus students can broaden their eyesight and also keep updating the technology and its applications of the generation.
schedule:
課程安排分為兩部分：
1. 邀請專家專題演講 (8~10 場）
2. 研究生個別專題報告
The course is divided to two parts:
1. Speech from invited speakers (8-10 speakers)
2. Individual oral presentation from graduate student
scorePolicy:
1. 心得報告 （30%)
2. 口頭報告 (40%)
3. 平時成績 (30%)

1. Written report (30%)
2. Oral presentation (40%)
3. Class performance (30%)
課程對應SDGs指標: SDG4：優質教育（Quality Education）SDG8：尊嚴就業與經濟發展（Decent Work and Economic Growth）SDG17：夥伴關係（Partnerships for the Goals）
課程是否導入AI: ● 鼓勵學生使用生成式 AI 工具（Encourage students to use generative AI tools）
remarks: 備註：因應疫情若規定遠距上課，將調整之上課方式使用線上上課專題討論 Google Meet 會議視訊通話連結：https://meet.google.com/kvp-ekup-rpi
